TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Paqiy, title = Paqiy, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paqiy} }

S.FORM: Paqiy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Paqiy a niyaro', 42 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 159 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 80%, Bunun 6%, Amis 1%, Puyuma 1%, Truku 1%, roma 2%.

Paqiy Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Paqiy a niyaro', 42 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 159 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 147 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 12 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 80%, Bonon 6%, Amis 1%, Poyoma 1%, Troko 1%, roma 2%.
